short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pop-up video game that intercepts bored shoppers from over consuming fast fashion. Save money. Save the planet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boredom is like a game… you’re in control.

Drippy Dawg is a video game that intercepts bored shoppers from over consuming fast fashion. Save money. Save the planet. Play Drippy Dawg.
